import React, { PureComponent } from 'react' import {Bar} from 'react-chartjs-2'; class Salesperson extends PureComponent { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { chartData:{ labels:['Aug 2019','Sep 2019','Oct 2019','Nov 2019','Dec 2019','Jan 2019'], datasets:[ { label:'Sales Vs Month', data:[ 47000, 75000, 55500, 67000, 87600, 50000 ], barThickness:30, backgroundColor:[ 'rgba(255,99,132,0.6)', 'rgba(54,162,235,.6)', 'rgba(255,206,86,.6)', 'rgba(75,192,192,0.6)', 'rgba(153,102,255,0.6)', 'rgba(255,159,64,0.6)' ] } ] } } } render() { return (
Mr {this.props.sale.name}
